name: ByteRover Explore
description: Systematically explore a codebase and curate findings into ByteRover's context tree
long_description: A structured workflow for systematically exploring a codebase and curating findings into ByteRover's context tree. Maps technology stack, architecture, conventions, testing patterns, integrations, and concerns via brv curate. Also assesses documentation coverage and identifies knowledge gaps.

use_cases: Building a knowledge base from scratch
